goal: Our NGO aims at creating a network in support of Clean Air policies in Italy, joining in various citizens groups spread around Italy to jointly advocate and achieve swift improvement  of air quality policies in Italy. Citizens for Air also wishes to bridge the gap between advocacy in favour of Clean Air and scientific reseach which is crucial to support the adoption of plans and programs that are consistent with emission reductions. It will also support robust European policies in favour of Clean Air through European NGOs. Citizens for Air believes in advocacy, environmental legal defense and citizenship participation in planning and participatory science projects
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Support to EEB work for Italy

Currently advocating for ambitious NECD we have just coordinated a 24 Italian ngos letter to our Prime Minister and various Ministers involved to support ambitious air quality policies and targets
